metadata.title: CVE-2024-9397 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A missing delay in directory upload UI could have made it possible for anattacker to trick a user into granting permission via clickjacking. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 131, Firefox ESR < 128.3, Thunderbird <128.3, and Thunderbird < 131.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
